hibernate-mapping.query: FROM BaSectorMast so WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM StRoutingNoDtls r, PmFinInstDirMast f, BaSectorMast s WHERE r.compositeId.codRoutingNo = f.compositeId.codFinInstId AND r.codSector = s.compositeId.codClgSector AND r.compositeId.flgMntStatus = 'A' AND r.compositeId.flgMntStatus = 'A' AND f.codBI = :codBI AND s.compositeId.codClgSector = so.compositeId.codClgSector ) AND CONCAT( CASE WHEN LENGTH(so.compositeId.codClgSector) = 1 THEN CONCAT('000', so.compositeId.codClgSector) WHEN LENGTH(so.compositeId.codClgSector) = 2 THEN CONCAT('00', so.compositeId.codClgSector) WHEN LENGTH(so.compositeId.codClgSector) = 3 THEN CONCAT('0', so.compositeId.codClgSector) ELSE CONCAT('', so.compositeId.codClgSector) END, CONCAT(' - ', so.namClgSector) ) LIKE UPPER(:strLike)
